This game still holds its place in the top ten best games even with todays standards. The graphics are still some of the best. Honestly this game is so cheap theres no point of not buying it
Bought this years ago on the xbox, didnt play it too much. bought it on steam sale and played through it instantly. super fun game even in 2021
Fun game 10/10 its more fun with frends

The game is absolutely amazing, with many easter eggs to find, great graphics (especially for a 2011 game, I was baffled to see it). The puzzles are fun to solve and make you think outside the box, however, they are not impossible, and are solvable, if you look around and use what you already know. I used a few walkthroughs in a few levels, but mainly because I am new to these types of games. The only thing that was meh to me was the story, as the first few and the last few chapters are full of new details and the middle was kind of filler, but I enjoyed every single chapter nonetheless. Greatly reccommend!
so confusing, but i enjoy playing it

Story: by far the most interesting story of this past millennia and is one  of the most funniest games in human history
Gameplay: improves the mechanics of the original in fun and creative ways
Online mode: the most I have played in a video game in a long while
Overall: would recommend playing it
traz nostalgia de quando jogava no xbox 360

I have always loved the first portal game, the story being easy and very captivating to understand, but ever since the addition of the sequel, the story makes no sense, my, and the rest of the gaming community's most important question being:
"Who is portal, and why is he so 2?"

This game is long ( which matters a good deal for a mostly SP game that said it does have CO OP last time I checked ) it has a great soundtrack that I still listen to today and has simple mechanics and gameplay that are quite addictive.

I would pay 20.99$ for this game if I had too but I ( and everyone else ) dont.
